Title: Episode 4
Plot: When Carol discovers her best friend Lillian had an affair with her husband back in the seventies, she takes revenge by reporting her to the DSS for benefit fraud. Frank Gallagher, who has been posing as Lillian's dead husband and claiming his benefits, comes under suspicion.
ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, nudity, drug use and offensive language
GuestStars: Katy Cavanagh, Sarah Parks, Andrew Sheridan, Denise Kennedy, Toby Hadoke, Graeme Hawley
